page.title: 17COSTELLO STADIUM WEST HULL
page.content: THE ENGLISH SCHOOLS ATHLETICS FINALS WERE HELD AT COSTELLO STADIUM ON FRIDAY AND SATURDAY, THE 12TH. AND 13TH. OF JULY. 7000 SPECTATORS WATCHED 700 COMPETITORS, SUPERVISED BY 600 OFFICIALS WITH 600 YOUNG HELPERS. RON PICKERING WAS THE SPECIAL GUEST. MOST RECORDS WERE BROKEN IN THE INTERMEDIATE GIRLS AND BOYS EVENTS, ALTHOUGH THE WINDY WEATHER ON FRIDAY MADE LIFE HARD FOR THE ATHLETES. HUMBERSIDE ONLY GOT ONE PLACE, WITH RUTH ELDER 2ND IN THE SENIOR 400 MTRS. THE TULLOH TWINS CAME FIRST AND THIRD IN THE JUNIOR GIRLS 1500 MTRS, AND A SURPISE WAS THE 2ND PLACE OF SIMONE JACOBS THE OLYMPIC RELAY MEDALIST. THIS EVENT IS TIMED TO PERFECTION; THE LAST OF HUNDREDS OF EVENTS WAS DELAYED 40SEC. TO START ON TIME AT 5.15PM! NEXT YEAR THE FINALS ARE AT PORTSMOUTH.
